      • setUpInputHandler

        public static void setUpInputHandler(javafx.scene.Scene scene)
        Parameters:
        scene - The scene to which we listen for mouse & keyboard events. This method updates all the variables within this class according to the status of the keyboard and mouse.

      • isKeyDown

        public static boolean isKeyDown(javafx.scene.input.KeyCode keycode)
        Parameters:
        keycode - The code for the key you wish to query. (e.g. KeyCode.A)
        Returns:
        This method just returns true/false depending on whether that key is down. The method also returns false if the key is not present in the map.
